item.description:
Hello all,

Gina is hosting a game night event at her place. She'll be serving lite refreshments. BYOB Bring a snack.

There is good parking across the street at the Lucas Law firm parking lot. 

Please bring $1.00 Nina money to help our organizer with the cost of the meetup subscription.
item.how_to_find_us: Gina's Place - 10 Grosvenor Place Norwich CT 06360
item.why: It's fun - a good group of people

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Play games!
